uk.co.indigo.epc
Class SSCC96Codec

java.lang.Object
  uk.co.indigo.epc.SSCC96Codec

public class SSCC96Codec
extends java.lang.Object

Encodes and decodes SSCC96 codes.

Author:
milbuw

Method Detail

encodeSSCC96

public static java.lang.String encodeSSCC96(java.lang.String sscc,
                                            int L,
                                            int F)
Encodes SSCC decimal to 96-bit binary string.

Parameters:
sscc - The decimal SSCC E.g. "106141411928374657".
L - The "L" value specified by EPC spec - Company Prefix Digits.
F - The "F" value specified by EPC spec - Filter Value.
Returns:
A 96-bit binary string version of the SSCC code.

encodeSSCC96

public static java.lang.String encodeSSCC96(TagSSCC96 tag)
Encodes SSCC96 Tag object to 96-bit binary string.

Parameters:
tag - A TagSSCC96 object.
Returns:
A 96-bit binary string version of the SSCC96 Tag.

decodeSSCC96

public static TagSSCC96 decodeSSCC96(java.lang.String ssccBits)
                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Decodes a 96-bit binary string to a TagSSCC96 object.

Parameters:
ssccBits - The 96-bit binary string.
Returns:
A TagSSCC96 object representing the SSCC code.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the input string is not valid.

validSerialReference

private static boolean validSerialReference(long serialReference,
                                            int L)
Validates the serial reference.

Parameters:
serialReference - The company prefix to check.
L - The supposed number of digits in the company prefix. (Serial reference digits are 17 - L).
Returns:
True if valid, otherwise false.

parseCompanyPrefix

private static java.lang.String parseCompanyPrefix(java.lang.String ssccBits,
                                                   int M,
                                                   int L)
Parses the company prefix index from the sscc binary string.

Parameters:
ssccBits - The binary string.
M - The M value defined by EPC spec. The number of CPI digits.
L - The L value defined by EPC spec. The number of CPI bits.
Returns:
A string containing the CPI padded to the correct length with leading zeroes.

parseSerialReference

private static java.lang.String parseSerialReference(java.lang.String ssccBits,
                                                     int M,
                                                     int L)
Parses the serial reference from the sscc binary string.

Parameters:
ssccBits - The binary string.
M - The M value defined by EPC spec. The number of CPI digits. (This is so you know where to slice from to get the serial reference).
L - The L value defined by EPC spec. The number of CPI bits.
Returns:
A string containing the serial reference, padded to the correct length by leading zeroes.

prependZeroes

private static java.lang.String prependZeroes(int zeroes,
                                              java.lang.String sliceBinStr)
Prepends the specified number of zeroes to the beginning of a string.

Parameters:
zeroes - The number of zeroes to prepend.
sliceBinStr - The string to prepend to.
Returns:
A string padded with leading zeroes.

prependZeroes

private static java.lang.String prependZeroes(int zeroes,
                                              long sliceDecimal)
Prepends leading zeroes to a long.

Parameters:
zeroes - The number of zeroes to prepend.
sliceDecimal - The long value to prepend to.
Returns:
A string containing the long, padded to the correct length with leading zeroes.

Calculates the check digit according to the rules specified in the EPC spec.

Parameters:
ssccNoCheckDigit - The sscc with no check digit.
Returns:
The check digit.
